column5: Was thinking of going to bass pro but wasn't sure. Does anyone know of a place were I can get have decent marine carpet not looking to go expensive itâ€™s just for a small 12 ft aluminum? Thank you.
Home depot or Rona will sell a carpet that will do the trick.
Hey Silvio, heres a interesting link to help you get started. Same sized boat but its a fiberglass not aluminum http://hometown.aol.com/brideg19/BassBoatConversion.html
homedepot stuff works well and its fairly cheap.last about 2-3 seasons uncovered.cover or store indoors and it should last.
whats this homedepot stuff just normal carpet?
I think its just outdoor carpet, it does the job but as mentioned it only lasts a couple of seasons and catches hooks alot easier
It is called marine carpet. You can pick it up at most Home Depots. Make sure when you install it, you glue it and staple it. I re-did my princecraft five years ago, still looks brand new.  Terry
